branchCategory.name: HAW
branchCategory.description: <P>Series HAW is able to cool high temperature compressed air from compressors down to 40°C or less while efficiently removing moisture from the air. As the HAW is water cooled, it can be used where there is high temperature, high moisture and heavy foreign particles. A thermometer makes it easy to check outlet air temperature.</P>

branchItem.name: HAW, Water Cooled Aftercooler
branchItem.description: <P>Series HAW is able to cool high temperature compressed air from compressors down to 40°C or less while efficiently removing moisture from the air. As the HAW is water cooled, it can be used where there is high temperature, high moisture and heavy foreign particles. A thermometer makes it easy to check outlet air temperature.</P>
